message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms and rash suggest Kawasaki disease, which can lead to coronary artery complications. Screening for coronary artery abnormalities is important in this patient. Gallbladder, mitral valve, and pylorus are not typically affected by Kawasaki disease.

Gallbladder, mitral valve, and pylorus are not commonly affected by Kawasaki disease.
